CharacterStyleRange.Content: Please provide the following information to submit the request for reimbursement:
laims must be submitted within 4-8 weeks from the date the activity occurred.
- Submit the reimbursement form along with a copy of the approved form for our reference, all receipts and
4 color photos taken during the event from different angles.
- John Deere Water will reimburse up to 50% of the marketing activity as per program condition, terms
- The reimbursement will be paid in the form of credit memo.
- Allow 4-8 weeks to process payment from the date the claim is received
- Mail the claim form along with your booth rental contract, receipts and photos to the address below

ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: The tool kit provides a variety of items available to promote the John Deere Water brand along with the dealership in your market place. Some of the items available can be co-branded with your dealership logo and other items can only use the John Deere Water logo.
You can order the items by going to the Promotion Market Program website: jdwuspromotions.com
All items ordered through the online site are eligible for 50% reimbursement.
These items could be used at tradeshows, grower meetings, sales events, trainings and inside the store.
- Ready to Run Ads: Co-branded templates are available to run ads in your local magazine or newspaper.
- Ready to run Direct Mailers: Co-branded templates are available to create your own campaing.
- Invitations for Dealer Events: Co-branded templates are available for dealer events invitations.
- JDW Hats with the option of dealer name embroidered on the back
- 2012 JDW Calendars with Dealer logo (back drop ad). Not available until 07/11
- JDW T-Shirts with dealer name printed on left sleeve
- JDW Dealer Polo Shirts with dealer name embroidered on the left sleeve

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aHeadline%3aHeadline 1 Medium 24pt Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: Elite Dealer Market Promotion Tool Kit

CharacterStyleRange.Content: Approved advertising material is available for reimbursement and can be found at
- Ready to run ads templates are available to download at jdwuspromotions.com.
- Co-branded dealer events invitation templates are available to order at jdwuspromotions.com.
Market Promotions Program claims must be submitted to 9qjdwuspromotions@johndeerewater.com, within
4-8 weeks from the date the activity occurred.
Submit the reimbursement form along with a copy of the pre-approved form, all receipts and 4 color
photos taken during the event from different angles.
- JDW will reimburse up to 50% of the marketing activity as per program conditions, terms and budget.
- The reimbursement will be paid in the form of a credit memo.
- Allow 4-8 weeks to process payment from the date the claim is received.
- All reimbursements submissions must be submitted by October 1, 2011.
ail the claim form along with your booth rental contract, receipts and photos to the address below or
Attn: Market Promotion Program / Liz Soto

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: - Unattended (static) displays are not eligible for reimbursement.
- Alcohol beverages are not eligible for reimbursement.
ohn Deere has the right to deny co-op for any ad that is derogatory, illegal, or portrays John Deere
- Agency commission is NOT eligible for co-op.
- Production, talent, agency and tax costs are not eligible for co-op.
ohn Deere reserves the right to audit or inspect any books, ledgers, receipts, or records as they pertain
Any media and/or dealer perpetrating co-op fraud will be disqualified for any future John Deere co-op
- John Deere Water logo placement on catalogs is not reimbursable.

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aHeadline%3aHeadline 1 Medium 24pt Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: Elite Dealer Market Promotion Program Guidelines (Cont.)

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: You will find detailed information regarding the use of promotional funds for the stated marketing activities. Please contact your District Sales Manager to discuss your activity and, if applicable, fill out the Dealer/ Show event pre-approval request form. Please refer to these guidelines when submitting requests for approval and for reimbursement purposes.
Marketing opportunities eligible for promotional funds:
Booth space and rental expenses are eligible for promotional reimbursement on a proportional basis;
based upon % of JDW dedicated space.
- For example, if a booth space exhibits 30% dedicated to JDW products, we will reimburse the 50% of the
- Not elegible for reimbursement if direct competitors are displayed.
- If using a JDW branded tent or pop up booth; 100% of products displayed must be JDW products.
- Examples of dealer events are: Grower Meetings, Sales Event, Training, Branch grand opening.
- Dealer Show/Event pre-approval form should be signed by your Regional Sales Manager and submitted for
approval 4 weeks before the event occurs.

Photos may be sent electronically to the email address 9qjdwuspromotions@johndeerewater.com, in lieu of actual prints. The file must include dealership name and account number, as well as show name and show date. If you choose to submit the photos electronically, please make note on your claim form that "photos were sent electronically on (date)".
Dealers must use John Deere Water Point of Sale Advertising material available in the Market Promotions
- Examples of approved point of sale advertising are: banners, flags, counter mats.
- Visit jdwuspromotions.com to order point of sales material.

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: - Approved John Deere Water promotional items are available and eligible for reimbursement.
- Examples of approved promotional items are: hats, calendars, t-shirts, polo shirts, counter mats and
- Visit jdwuspromotions.com to order approved items.

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aHeadline%3aHeadline 1 Medium 24pt Black
ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aHeadline%3aHeadline 1 Medium 24pt Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: Elite Dealer Market Promotion Program Guidelines

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: The objective of this program is to provide tools to enable your dealership to promote John Deere Water ("JDW") products. JDW will reimburse a portion of the reported activity as defined in the promotion guidelines.
- To be eligible for the Market Promotion Program funds, a dealer must maintain Elite dealer classification.
- An eligible dealer should submit a pre-approval request form before the activity occurs.
JDW Market Promotion program budgets are established by a percentage of eligible orders based on a 12 month period ending October 31, 2010:
JDW 12 month net sales x 0.50% = JDW Dealer Advertising co-op budget.
example: FY2010 Net Sales: $1,000,000 / FY2011 Budget: $5,000.
Dealer will be credited 1/2 of the total cost of eligible promotion activities as defined in the promotion guidelines.
- An Elite dealer is defined as one who meets Elite criteria and has executed a signed JDW dealer agreement.
he appropriate form required for activity pre-approval and reimbursement is available from your local
District Sales Manager and at jdwuspromotions.com.
- For your convenience a copy of the forms can be found in this packet.
Details regarding guidelines for the Market Promotion Program and reimbursement are defined in the
Activity pre-approval requests must be forwarded to 9qjdwuspromotions@Johndeerewater.com 4 weeks
- Dealer must submit reimbursement forms within 3 weeks after the event.
- Reimbursement is contingent on JDW receiving copies of the original receipts.
- Credits will be processed within 4-8 weeks from submission date.
- Dealers must maintain dealer classification status to remain eligible for use of funds.
- John Deere Water reserves the right to make changes to this program at any time.
- The FY2011 program is valid from February 1st to October 31st, 2011.
- Market Promotion Program unused funds will not roll over to FY2012.

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black
ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black
ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aHeadline%3aHeadline 1 Medium 24pt Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: Annual Elite Dealer Market Promotion Program

ParagraphStyleRange.AppliedParagraphStyle: ParagraphStyle/John Deere Paragraph Styles%3aBody Text%3aBody Text Medium 10pt Half Space Black

CharacterStyleRange.Content: As John Deere Water, we are committed to working with our dealer channel in order to satisfy the needs of our mutual customer the grower. A key component of our Dealer Strategy is to identify market promotion opportunities in which we can partner with you, the dealer, to achieve exceptional results. After gathering feedback from you, our valued partners, we are proud to announce the introduction of the 2011 Elite Dealer Market Promotion Program. This program is constructed to reward dealers who see John Deere Water as long-term partners and want to engage in marketing activity that promote our common goals.

We have created an easy to use Promotional Program Packet that will guide you through the key features, benefits, and guidelines associated with this program. The enclosed packet includes the following key sections:

At John Deere Water we are committed to our mutual success and are excited to offer this exclusive program for our Elite Dealers. This program will allow you to leverage the John Deere Brand and effectively market to your most important customer segments. We feel this program will be a powerful tool to increase awareness of John Deere Water products and the world class dealers that support those products.
We welcome your feedback on this program. If you have comments or questions please contact your Sales Representative.

The Elite Market Promotion Program is designed to help Elite John Deere Water dealers promote the John Deere Water products in the dealer's market. The policies listed in this document are designed to work in conjuntion with the ready to run materials offered through the programs online portal.

CharacterStyleRange.Content: Elite Dealer Market Promotion Program Program
